cleaned_text: Maria De jesus Gomez-medina LIC.AC, MSOM. Acupuncturist103 n park [Show map](#) About Maria Gomez-medina is an acupuncturist practicing in SAN ANTONIO, TX. PhD ( Mexico) Lic Ac. Gomez-medina evaluates and treats patients based on the concepts of oriental medicine. Acupuncturists complete their evaluations by getting a patient history and looking at and touching the body. Then, they place very fine acupuncture needles into specific points on the body. Stimulating these points and nerves is how Dr. Gomez-medina treats the patients condition. Many of the bodys systems respond to acupuncture, and it can treat physical pain as well as emotional stress. She completed Medical school at the Universidad Autonoma de Guadalajara , she got a fellowship in Aesthetic Medicine in Guadalajara and then she moved to San antonio in 2002 so she has the advantage of integrate Wester and Eeastern Medicine Education and Training Universidad Autonoma de Guadal MD 1982 Texas Health and Science Unive MSOM 2019 Provider Details Maria De jesus Gomez-medina LIC.AC, MSOM.'s Expert Contributions [Is acupuncture good for swollen knees?](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Is-acupuncture-good-for-swollen-knees) We have to evaluate your condition. Swollen knees can have several causes. [READ MORE](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Is-acupuncture-good-for-swollen-knees) [Does acupuncture help shoulder bursitis?](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Does-acupuncture-help-shoulder-bursitis) Bursitis in the Shoulder is very common these days due to hours in front of the computer or the phone. is more common in women after 50 and it may be referred to as Frozen Shoulder. We help with the inflammation by bringing more blood flow to the area with acupuncture and if indicated we may use electrical stimulation to expedite the recovery this will increase the range of motion and will reduce the pain. [READ MORE](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Does-acupuncture-help-shoulder-bursitis) [Can acupuncture help with sweating?](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Can-acupuncture-help-with-sweating) Hi, According to the TCM theory, when a person sweats a lot or easily is because the energy (QI) that holds the vital substances in is weak. that will cause eventually what we called yin deficiency the symptoms will be dry skin, dry mouth, irritability, dry stools, etc. . Acupuncture can help combined with herb treatment. [READ MORE](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Can-acupuncture-help-with-sweating) [Does acupuncture work for tendonitis hand?](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Does-acupuncture-work-for-tendonitis-hand) Tendonitis in the hand is very common these days due to overuse or repetitive movement like at the computer or phone or gamming. this can be referred to as Carpal Tunnel syndrome by your doctor. we can help increase blood flow to the area, relax the muscles with electrical stimulation, and use infrared therapy and herbs. [READ MORE](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Does-acupuncture-work-for-tendonitis-hand) [Where is the acupuncture point for migraine?](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Where-is-the-acupuncture-point-for-migraine) Migraine is a symptom not the root of the problem. various patients can have headaches or migraine but the treatment may vary and the acupuncture points may vary according to the root of the problem. [READ MORE](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Where-is-the-acupuncture-point-for-migraine) [Is acupuncture an effective treatment for pain?](https://www.findatopdoc.com/Questions/Is-acupuncture-an-effective-treatment-for-pain) Yes. Acupuncture is excellent to treat pain because increases the blood flow to the area helping to recuperate faster and reducing muscle spasms and inflammation. (The root of the problem) if it is structural or muscular or nerve pain.
